attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all hate Monday's and I propose that we work a 4 day week Monday through to Thursday.  There is no logic to working a 5 day week and I feel if we worked a 4 day week it would increase productivity in the work place.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
